A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Fun flick with good story progression and interesting character development. Many nods to ESB and ROJ but not a retelling of a story we've already seen. If you liked any of the Star Wars movies\, you should like this one.  If you love the comics and books outside of the movies and expect this movie to pay homage to that other fiction\, you will be disappointed.\nGreat movie that will hold up.
